perturbation.original_text: 4.3 Party B shall first pay a deposit of RMB100,000 to Party A within 5 working days after the signing of this Agreement. For list more products, Party B shall apply to Party A 3 working days in advance and after obtaining the consent of Party A, pay the deposit in full within 5 working days from the date of receipt of the deposit notice from Party A.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.3 Party B shall first pay a deposit of RMB100,000 to Party A within 1 working day after the signing of this Agreement. For list more products, Party B shall apply to Party A 1 working day in advance and after obtaining the consent of Party A, pay the deposit in full within 1 working day from the date of receipt of the deposit notice from Party A.
perturbation.explanation: This change shortens the payment timeframe for the deposit, which may contradict regulations requiring reasonable timeframes for financial transactions, potentially creating undue burden.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potentially contradicts general principles of contract law regarding reasonable timeframes and fair business practices, and possibly specific regulations around payment terms in China.

perturbation.original_text: 3.2.4 Party B shall be obliged to verify the actual use of the leased vehicles, assist and ensure that the Driver User purchases corresponding insurance according to the actual use of the leased vehicles; if the leased vehicle is used for online Ride- hailing operation, in case that the provisions of the local Laws on online Ride-hailing insurance are changed within the term of cooperation or the provisions of the local Laws on online Ride-hailing are officially implemented within the term of cooperation, Party B shall inform the Driver User within 3 working days after the change of local Laws and regulations on Ride-hailing or the effective implementation thereof, assist the Driver User and ensure that the insurance of the leased vehicle shall be changed in accordance with the provisions of local Laws on ride-hailing to make the insurance of the leased vehicle comply with the provisions of relevant Laws and regulations on Ride-hailing at that time.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.2.4 Party B shall be obliged to verify the actual use of the leased vehicles, assist and ensure that the Driver User purchases corresponding insurance according to the actual use of the leased vehicles; if the leased vehicle is used for online Ride- hailing operation, in case that the provisions of the local Laws on online Ride-hailing insurance are changed within the term of cooperation or the provisions of the local Laws on online Ride-hailing are officially implemented within the term of cooperation, Party B is not required to inform the Driver User after the change of local Laws and regulations on Ride-hailing or the effective implementation thereof, and does not need to assist the Driver User and ensure that the insurance of the leased vehicle shall be changed in accordance with the provisions of local Laws on ride-hailing to make the insurance of the leased vehicle comply with the provisions of relevant Laws and regulations on Ride-hailing at that time.
perturbation.explanation: This modification removes the obligation for Party B to inform the driver user of any changes in local laws. This could violate local regulations that require informing the driver user of changes in local law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contradicts local laws in Beijing requiring transparency regarding Ride-Hailing Insurance, and duty of information in contractual relationships.

perturbation.original_text: 4.7 After Party B terminates or rescinds this Agreement, if there is no effective Vehicle Lease Agreement between Party B and a Driver User (if the operational leasing business is conducted) and there is no dispute on the vehicle lease between Party B and a Driver User, Party A shall refund the remaining deposit to Party B on a interest-free basis within 30 days after receipt of the deposit receipt returned by Party B; if there is any effective Vehicle Lease Agreement between Party B and a Driver User or if there is any disputes on the vehicle lease between Party B and a Driver User, Party A shall refund the remaining deposit to Party B on a interest-free basis within 30 days after receipt of the deposit receipt returned by Party B after the driver confirms the Vehicle Lease Agreement has been fulfilled or the dispute has been resolved.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.7 After Party B terminates or rescinds this Agreement, if there is no effective Vehicle Lease Agreement between Party B and a Driver User (if the operational leasing business is conducted) and there is no dispute on the vehicle lease between Party B and a Driver User, Party A shall refund the remaining deposit to Party B on a interest-free basis within 90 days after receipt of the deposit receipt returned by Party B; if there is any effective Vehicle Lease Agreement between Party B and a Driver User or if there is any disputes on the vehicle lease between Party B and a Driver User, Party A shall refund the remaining deposit to Party B on a interest-free basis at Party A's discretion, but no more than 180 days after receipt of the deposit receipt returned by Party B after the driver confirms the Vehicle Lease Agreement has been fulfilled or the dispute has been resolved.
perturbation.explanation: Increasing the refund timeframe to 90 and 180 days may violate regulations that mandate a shorter refund period.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potentially contradicts consumer protection laws in China that may stipulate shorter refund timeframes, and general principles of fair trade.
